name: W.I.G.
description:
Goofy Flight SIM where you have to skim the ground to build momentum and go through the rings to earn points. You end the game when you lose too much momentum or collide with something. 

This is about a two month polish of my original prototype for the Weekly Game Jam. I enjoyed the concept so much I wanted to make a fully realized level. In my pursuit of learning, I want to move on to another game prototype, but depending on the reception of this, I will go back and make a few more levels and work it out to a full game. 

Any feedback is much appreciated, and I hope you enjoy it. Thank you for taking the time to play.
